code:
-spec sum_counts(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
sum_counts(Nums) ->
    Mod = 1000000007,
    sum_counts(Nums, #{}, 0, 1, Mod, length(Nums)).

sum_counts([], _, Acc, _, _, _) -> Acc;
sum_counts([H|T], Map, Acc, Position, Mod, Len) ->
    {NewMap, Count} = case maps:find(H, Map) of
        {ok, OldPos} -> 
            {Map#{H => Position}, Position - OldPos};
        error -> 
            {Map#{H => Position}, 0}
    end,
    Remaining = Len - Position,
    NewAcc = Acc + (Remaining * (2 * Count + 1)) rem Mod,
    sum_counts(T, NewMap, NewAcc, Position + 1, Mod, Len).
